column5: Could anyone tell me the cheapest/best place in Canada to buy Lowrance fishfinders?

Call "Rauer Electronics" in Vancouver at 604-985-3355. I bought my X-19 from them last year over the phone. They were a couple hundred bucks less than anywhere else I could find and the service was excellent. Had the unit on the bus the same day as I ordered it and was exactly what I paid for. They also carry parts and do service and warranty work on Lowrance equipment.
